item.title: Augmenting Self-Therapy
item.description: For several months, I’ve been building and using a self-therapy practice environment based on the Internal Family Systems (IFS) model. I’ve found it very useful, and after some early positive feedback, I think others might find it useful, too. IFS changed my life when I first started working with it in 2020. It is a wonderfully empowering therapy that says we all have a Self; a vast, powerful resource for healing and transformation.
